mapper.select:
select
from smu_pin_state p where p.imei=#{imei}

select
from smu_pin_state p where
1=2
p.imei in
#{imei}

select
from smu_pin_state p WHERE p.isdelete=0
and p.imei=#{imei}
and p.online=0
and CAST(p.watch_power AS SIGNED INTEGER) < 20
and p.wddk_warning=3
